We're happy to announce the next CLAIRE/ESA Theme Development Workshop - on satellite communication - see https://indico.esa.int/event/334/ for further information and application for participation.

We expect this workshop to pave the way for joint projects on this exciting projects, which is of major importance to ESA, one of the world's leaders in this area.

The event will take place on 25 March 2020, 9:00-17:00 in Leiden, NL. Seats are limited, and participants will have a unique chance to build connections to leading teams at ESA.

Don't miss your chance to apply for participation!

Last chance to apply to the CLAIRE and ESA Theme Development Workshop on Satellite Communications, on 25 March in Leiden, NL.

We are about to make the final selection from a large number of applications for participation, and anyone who would like to be considered and has not yet applied via the web form (https://indico.esa.int/event/334/) should do so before the end of today.

AI for SatCom - ESA-CLAIRE workshop (25 March 2020): Overview · Indico at ESA / ESTEC (Indico)
The ever-growing connectivity requirements for voice and data communications, has resulted in the demand for new emerging technologies like 5G and Megaconstellations that will add enormous pressure to the current spectrum congestion situation and additionally will add massive complexity to spacecraft operations.
